TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestCode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the location of a point in the background specified by a visual style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The HitTestCode values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.HitTestBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Bottom = int32(15)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the bottom border segment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode BottomLeft = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the bottom and left border intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode BottomRight = int32(17)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the bottom and right border intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Client = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the middle background segment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Left = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the left border segment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Nowhere = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded outside the control or on a transparent area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Right = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the right border segment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode Top = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the top border segment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode TopLeft = int32(13)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the top and left border intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HitTestCode TopRight = int32(14)

Docs.summary: The hit test succeeded in the top and right border intersection.
